title: Blink-182 (album)
summary: The untitled fifth studio album by the American rock band Blink-182, referred to on digital streaming services as Blink-182, (stylized as blink-182,) was released on November 18, 2003, by Geffen Records. Following their ascent to stardom and success of their prior two releases, the trio was compelled to take a break and subsequently participated in various side projects (Box Car Racer and Transplants). When they regrouped, they felt inspired to approach song structure and arrangements differently on their next effort together.
